alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Interior Seward Peninsula; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 8:55AM AKST until January 16 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow with blizzard conditions and brief freezing rain possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting to 45 mph. Visibility one quarter mile or less at times. * WHERE...Southern Seward Peninsula Coast, Interior Seward Peninsula and Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause damage buildings and and power lines. Large snow drifts will form.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Interior Seward Peninsula; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast
